title: LIVE from Colorado Rocky Mountain Cigar Festival
itunes:title: LIVE from Colorado Rocky Mountain Cigar Festival
description: This week we’re live in Colorado at the Rocky Mountain Cigar Festival with special guests Les Mann – Executive Vice President of the new Colibri Company - as well as Terry Gallagher - President of Smoker Friendly stores and creator of the 1st Rocky Mountain Cigar festival.
